title: Steel halberd

properties.name: description
properties.value: A steel halberd is a halberd made of steel, requiring level 5 Attack to wield. It can be purchased from the Quartermaster in the Tyras Camp. Like all halberds, this weapon has an attack range of two squares, making it the only variety of melee weapon that can be used to safespot monsters. Halberds cannot be made with the Smithing skill.

Item ID3194

A steel halberd is a halberd made of steel, requiring level 5 Attack to wield. It can be purchased from the Quartermaster in the Tyras Camp. Like all halberds, this weapon has an attack range of two squares, making it the only variety of melee weapon that can be used to safespot monsters. Halberds cannot be made with the Smithing skill.

[[File:Steel halberd detail.png|left|150px]]
A '''steel halberd''' is a [[halberd]] made of [[steel equipment|steel]], requiring level 5 [[Attack]] to wield. It can be purchased from the [[Quartermaster]] in the [[Tyras Camp]]. Like all halberds, this weapon has an [[attack]] range of two squares, making it the only variety of [[melee weapon]] that can be used to [[safespot]] monsters. Halberds '''cannot''' be made with the [[Smithing]] skill.
